lines.text: Good evening, madame. Do you know what this is?

lines.character: La dame en noir et la soeur du premier préfet/Prefect's Sister

lines.text: A miraculous image of St. Joseph. It sometimes has amazing effects on the sick.

lines.character: La dame en noir et la soeur du premier préfet/Prefect's Sister

lines.text: Sometimes faith succeeds where science fails. We just came from the Marquise of Pomarede. She was near death. We brought her the image, we prayed, and this morning when we left the chateau...

lines.character: La dame en noir et la soeur du premier préfet/Prefect's Sister

lines.text: Sophie, it's impolite to use those words at the table!
You have cancer of the liver.
It's in a fairly advanced state. But today, you know, these things... Cigarette?
Madrid was filled with the stench of -pardon my language - food. It was indecent.
